segments.text: Let's take a coffee break , shall we ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I wish I could , but I can't .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: What keeps you so busy ? You've been sitting there for hours . You've got to walk around.You just can't stay on the computer forever .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Well , I am up to my neck in work . I've got to finish this report . Sarah needs it by noon . I don't want to be scolded if I can â€™ t finish my work by the deadline .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I understand that , but you'd feel better if you took a break , even for just a short while .
segments.speaker: S1
